title: Unit Pretty Value Format Context
description: The context for rendering custom unit prettyValue

value.title: Value
value.description: The value of the reward. If the reward is currency based, then this is the value in the currency's fractional unit.

currencySymbol.title: Currency Symbol
currencySymbol.description: The currency symbol in the rendering locale

currencyLocalizedSymbol.title: Currency Localized Symbol
currencyLocalizedSymbol.description: The currency symbol in the currency's native locale

currencyDisplayName.title: Currency Display Name
currencyDisplayName.description: The display name of the currency in the rendering locale

currencyLocalizedDisplayName.title: Currency Localized Display Name
currencyLocalizedDisplayName.description: The display name of the currency in the currency's native locale

currencyFractionalUnit.title: Currency Fractional Unit
currencyFractionalUnit.description: The fractional unit of the currency, e.g. "Cent".

currencyNumberToBasic.title: Currency Number To Basic
currencyNumberToBasic.description: How many the currency subdivision go into the currency, e.g. 100 pence to the pound.

valueInCurrencyBaseUnit.title: Value in Currency Base Unit
valueInCurrencyBaseUnit.description: The value of the reward in the currency's base unit
